title: pAlayamAn srI paTTAbirAma
sahitya:
pAlayamAm shrI paTTAbhirAma pAlita munijana stOma shrI rAma

anupallavi

 nIla nIrada shyAma bhaktajana prEma jAla kalmaSa virAma parandAma

caraNam 1

 pAkAri mukha sura paripAlana pankajAsana hrttApa shamana 
kAkusthAnvaya kalasha payOnidhi kalAnidhE suguNavAri nidhE
 
caraNam 2

 rAmacanrdapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata pAlana caturA 
rAmadAsa mAnasa sancArA rAjita kOsala nagara vihArA
